mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(DISTINCT p.amount), 0) FROM payment p LEFT JOIN reservation r ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON p.enrollment_id = e.enrollment_id LEFT JOIN rental ren ON p.rental_id = ren.rental_id WHERE (r.user_id = #{userId} OR e.user_id = #{userId} OR ren.user_id = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membership (membership_id, membership_level, user_id) VALUES (#{membership_id}, #{membership_level}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE membership SET membership_status = 'INACTIVE', used_benefit_count = 0, last_reset_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, membership_level = '브론즈' WHERE MONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) = 6 OR MONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) = 12;
